channel.title: CVE Feed for ShortPixel -- ShortPixel Image Optimizer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ShortPixel -- ShortPixel Image Optimizer

item.title: CVE-2024-48043|2024-10-17T14:11:36.381Z -- shortpixel -- shortpixel%20image%20optimizer
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in ShortPixel ShortPixel Image Optimizer allows Blind SQL Injection.This issue affects ShortPixel Image Optimizer: from n/a through 5.6.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-48043|2024-10-17T12:08:41.608Z -- shortpixel -- shortpixel%20image%20optimizer
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in ShortPixel ShortPixel Image Optimizer allows Blind SQL Injection.This issue affects ShortPixel Image Optimizer: from n/a through 5.6.3.
